customizations.markdown:
# Alerting Events Summary

Alert events ingested via the SolarWinds Orion Flex Integrations

![Add Images](data:image/png;base64,)
![Add Images](https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcRsd6GuoxZnPJHcA5QCe8amP2HXcByyTsnzOoU2tt-z03p8uNGo)

widgets.nrql: FROM solarwinds_alerts SELECT count(swAlert.alertName) FACET swAlert.relatedNode, swAlert.alertingEntity

widgets.title: Top 10 Alerts
widgets.nrql: FROM solarwinds_alerts SELECT count(swAlert.alertName) SINCE 1 DAY AGO FACET swAlert.alertName

widgets.title: Top 10 Alerts by Time of Day (Hour)
widgets.nrql: FROM solarwinds_alerts SELECT COUNT(swAlert.alertHistoryID) FACET hourOf(swAlert.alertTriggerTimeUTC), swAlert.alertName LIMIT 10

widgets.title: Top 10 Alerting Nodes by Time of Day (Hour)
widgets.nrql: FROM solarwinds_alerts SELECT COUNT(swAlert.alertHistoryID) FACET hourOf(swAlert.alertTriggerTimeUTC), swAlert.alertingEntity LIMIT 10

widgets.title: Alerts by Name Compared w. 1 Ago
widgets.nrql: FROM solarwinds_alerts SELECT count(*) COMPARE WITH  1 HOUR AGO FACET swAlert.alertName
